post.text: Sadly, the American dream is dead. But if I ever get elected president, I will bring it back, bigger and better than ever. â€¢DJT

comment.author: Michelle
comment.text: Mr. Trump! You WILL be Elected! There's no turning back America!

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: Why would you vote for him, look at what just happened in Dallas, if he was president right now that situation would be a whole lot worse

replies.author: Michelle
replies.text: Why would you vote for Clinton? She's going to jail!!!

replies.author: Michelle
replies.text: When Trump will be the president, these situations will not happen! Wake up!
